channel.title: KilleR-Scape! Join Now , Great Commuinty!
channel.description:
KILLER SCAPE! [u][i][b]MUST[/b][/i][/u] download client to see custom items and enjoy the full server gameplay! Webclient does work but custom items are nulls , hopfully will be sorted in future :) download link---- http://www.mediafire.com/?7gayqp47a1fdccb
Custom items such as: Wings (cape) Guilded gs , dragon gs , donaters gs! New colours for partyhats! Colourd whips! Donater outfit And meny more!!
Max combat : 255 Max skill level : 200 Max total level : 4400
Easy cash Good exp rate Great players , very helpful ask "baby jebus" (me) for any info if cant find anyone if im online :)
if there are players willing to donate to help improve this server the rate is : 10$ for administrator 1$ for moderator/Donator 5$ for all skills to 200 any other donators are happily accepted and thanked with many items and a great members zone :)
I would please ask you one other thing let me know in game that i was the one who told you about killer scape :) thanks baby jebus
:D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D
